channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [BHS7][Network] - Network equipment operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 3, 07:00 - 11:00 UTC

Sep 22, 07:34 UTC
Scheduled - Due to an imponderable we have to postpone the intervention.
We will post a new update to indicate the new maintenance dates

Sep 22, 07:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 8, 00:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 22/09/2022 11:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure, we will upgrade the version of multiple network equipment.

Sep 20, 22:18 UTC

End time : 03/10/2022 03:00 UTC

item.title: [RBX3][Infrastructure] - Rack 45B27
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 2, 22:00 UTC  -  Oct 4, 04:00 UTC

Sep 20, 16:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/10/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 04/10/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the operation.
Related Incident : [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 45B27
Service improvement : We are moving over the servers from rack 45B27. This resolved the issue with the remote reboot device being unavailable.

item.title: [RBX1][Dedicated Servers] - 06C03
item.description:
Sep 30, 07:12 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 30/09/2022 05:46 UTC
End Time : 30/09/2022 06:46 UTC
Service Status :All the servers are operational, the situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause :It was due to a malfunction in the electrical system.

Sep 30, 06:39 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 30/09/2022 05:46 UTC
Service impact : All servers in the rack are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX8][Infrastructure] - Rack R804R01
item.description:
Sep 29, 17:24 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 29/09/2022 16:33 UTC
End Time : 29/09/2022 17:23 UTC
Root cause : Network equipment malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Sep 29, 17:11 UTC
Identified - Start time : 29/09/2022 16:33 UTC
Service impact : The IPMI is not available.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Root cause : Network equipment malfunction
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX1][DedicatedServers] - Rack 06B03
item.description:
Sep 29, 10:14 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 29/09/2022 09:48 UTC
End Time : 29/09/2022 10:14 UTC
Root cause :Incident on the cooling system
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Sep 29, 10:06 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 29/09/2022 09:48 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack 06B03 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

item.title: [RBX4][Dedicated servers] - 51A01
item.description:
Sep 29, 09:46 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 29/09/2022 08:40 UTC
End Time : 29/09/2022 08:53 UTC
Service Impacted : Some servers were unavailable for a few minutes.
Root cause : The incident is due to a circuit breaker trip on this rack.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
